title: Outstanding Reviewers for Environmental Science: Water Research & Technology in 2023
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW90019G, Editorial

We would like to take this opportunity to highlight the Outstanding Reviewers for Environmental Science: Water Research & Technology in 2023, as selected by the editorial team for their significant contribution to the journal.
